entity.name: Narendra Modi
entity.description: Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi

text:
@PMOIndia @narendramodi Dear Sir 
Done M Tech in Mech Engg.
Working in a sponge iron plant near Rajgangpur 
Due to COVID-19 I had come to BBSR to my parent house 
After two months when I joined company asked me to resign as they reduced staffs 
Now I’m jobless 
Will you please help me Sir
